properties.name: spring.jda.token
properties.description: Discord bot token for authentication. Required.

properties.name: spring.jda.await-ready
properties.description: Whether to block startup until JDA is fully connected.

properties.name: spring.jda.activity.text
properties.description: Text to display as the activity description.

properties.name: spring.jda.activity.url
properties.description: URL for streaming activity (only for STREAMING type).

properties.name: spring.jda.commands.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable slash command auto-configuration (requires triumph-cmds on classpath).

properties.name: spring.jda.components.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable the component interaction system (buttons, select menus, modals).

properties.name: spring.jda.components.callback.max-size
properties.description: Maximum number of callbacks to store in the registry.

properties.name: spring.jda.components.callback.log-expirations
properties.description: Whether to log when callbacks expire.

properties.name: spring.jda.components.callback.disable-on-expire
properties.description: Whether to disable components when their callback expires.

properties.name: spring.jda.components.callback.expired-message
properties.description: Message to show when a user interacts with an expired component. Empty to ignore silently.

properties.name: spring.jda.components.handler.unknown-message
properties.description: Message to show when no handler is found for a component. Empty to ignore silently.

properties.name: spring.jda.components.handler.auto-acknowledge
properties.description: Whether to auto-acknowledge interactions if the handler doesn't.

values.description: Shows as do not disturb (red dot)
